page.title: 01WELCOME TO EAST COKER
page.content:
The block is a part of rural{South {Somerset}in South West England.The market town of{Yeovil}is about 2 miles to the north. The main settlements are the linked villages of{East and North Coker}and there are four hamlets;Nash,Holywell, Netherton and Lyatts. The village people are very active. The main occupation is farming though many residents actually work in one of the surrounding market towns.
Parish church:St.Michael's. Village school:North Coker. Clubs:Art,Sports,Drama,W.I.East Coker Society,Time to Share,Youth Groups. Other features:Art gallery, Sutton Bingham church,Almshouses,Reservoir.
